title: Will My Kids Be Okay After the Divorce?
description:
In today’s show, we hear from a woman ready to divorce her husband over years of money disagreements, a mom hoping to learn strategies to stop yelling at her kids, and a woman who needs to grieve her divorce after her husband cheated with her best friend.
  Lyrics of the Day: "Hero" - Enrique Iglesias
  Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.
  Support Our Sponsors:
  BetterHelp

  Resources:
  Own Your Past, Change Your Future
